com.theeyetribe.clientsdk.utils

Class CalibUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.theeyetribe.clientsdk.utils.CalibUtils

  • public class CalibUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods associated to evaluating the quality of a CalibrationResult.

      • getCalibQuality

        public static CalibUtils.CalibQuality getCalibQuality(CalibrationResult result)
        Return CalibQuality based on CalibrationResult object.
        Parameters:
        result - calibration result to evaluate
        Returns:
        CalibQuality according to CalibrationResult paramenter

      • getCalibRating

        public static int getCalibRating(CalibrationResult result)
        Return an int representation of calibration quality based on CalibrationResult object.

        Useful for setting 'star rating' UI components explaining the current calibration quality.

        Parameters:
        result - calibration result to evaluate
        Returns:
        int value from 0-4, higher number equals better calibration

      • initCalibrationPoints

        public static java.util.List<Point2D> initCalibrationPoints(int rows,
                                                            int columns,
                                                            int width,
                                                            int height)
        Helper method that generates geometric calibration points based on desired rect area.

        This is useful when implementing a custom calibration UI.

        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows in calibration point grid
        columns - the number of columns in calibration point grid
        width - width of the rect area to spread the calibration points in
        height - height of the rect area to spread the calibration points in
        Returns:
        list of calibration points

      • initCalibrationPoints

        public static java.util.List<Point2D> initCalibrationPoints(int rows,
                                                            int columns,
                                                            int width,
                                                            int height,
                                                            boolean shuffle)
        Helper method that generates geometric calibration points based on desired rect area.

        This is useful when implementing a custom calibration UI.

        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows in calibration point grid
        columns - the number of columns in calibration point grid
        width - width of the rect area to spread the calibration points in
        height - height of the rect area to spread the calibration points in
        shuffle - should the returned calibration point be shuffled
        Returns:
        list of calibration points

      • initCalibrationPoints

        public static java.util.List<Point2D> initCalibrationPoints(int rows,
                                                            int columns,
                                                            double width,
                                                            double height,
                                                            double paddingHors,
                                                            double paddingVert)
        Helper method that generates geometric calibration points based on desired rect area.

        This is useful when implementing a custom calibration UI.

        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows in calibration point grid
        columns - the number of columns in calibration point grid
        width - width of the rect area to spread the calibration points in
        height - height of the rect area to spread the calibration points in
        paddingHors - optional horizontal padding in rect area
        paddingVert - optional vertical padding in rect area
        Returns:
        list of calibration points
